boardgame.name: Hoplomachus: The Lost Cities
boardgame.description: Hoplomachus [ha-ploh-ma-kuss], or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Hoplo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; for short, is a hex-based tactical board game set inside a gladiatorial arena. One to three players, each representing an ancient city/civilization thought to have been lost to the world, are now on Rome's doorstep vying for a place in the prestigious arena games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players have a very clear objective: Eliminate the opponent's champion. Champions start the game in the arena but are inactive and defenseless. They will not fight until the crowd is behind them. Each player takes turns drawing, playing and moving gladiators from their _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;hand_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and assisting them with tactic chips._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Based on opponent's moves and play style, each person will need to adjust their strategies. Defend your champ, take over and hold the crowd favor areas, assault opponent's champion, cover deployment zones, eliminate tacticians to reduce enemy options, fight beasts to gain crowd favor, the list of tactical possibilities is endless._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Hoplomachus combines combat, tactics, chip (units) management, level progression (through crowd favor system), team play, player vs board, and so much more._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: The game is fully intact and in like new condition. This is an original Kickstarter copy. It includes two arena maps: The main arena and the kickstarter expansion arena. The game has only been played 4 times.

This sale is for a pre-production copy of the game. The art is slightly different from the production version but it doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t affect gameplay at all, and the game could still be mixed in with the other games in the series without a problem. There is a little crease in the top right corner of the box, but it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s minor. There is also some fading or a misprint on the coloring on the right side of the box. The game is complete except for it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s missing four reference cards. The reference cards aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t necessary. There are three chips that are missing the backs. They are only used as markers to designate which city is being attacked during the co-op game. If they had backs, it would be the same Hoplomachus logo. The chips are not used in the solo or versus game. When used, they are placed face up so the missing back doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t matter. This is a great way to try out this game at a much lower price point. Please make any further inquiries prior to purchasing. Game comes from a smoke-free home and ships from 17538.
